title: Report a Near Miss Incident
description: A field operator reports a 'near miss' incident where a dropped tool nearly hit another worker, to ensure it is investigated and learned from.

tasks.description: Open the safety reporting application and select 'Report Near Miss'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct reporting form is opened.

tasks.description: Describe the incident, including the location, time, and what happened. Optionally, attach a photo of the scene.
tasks.expected_outcome: The details of the near miss are entered into the form.

tasks.description: Submit the report, which automatically triggers an investigation by the HSE department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is submitted, and a case is created in the incident management system.
